title: You might be bronze if....
body:
Plat khazix doesn't gank for 15m.

Signal him to come pickup the kill on ahri; doesn't come. She start's winning mid. I don't give her more than 1 kill but i get zoned a bit.

"I can't do anything cuz all lanes are losing, smh everytime"

End of game he goes 2/7/2 while the rest of us all have more gold than him and we lost entirely.

If you don't gank for 15m and cry when you get camped by enemy shaco, you might be bronze.
